class.name: DV_DetailPanel
class.brief_description: Flexible key-value inspector for presenting grouped records with optional progress indicators.

method.name: add_field
method.description: Appends a [DV_Field] to the panel. Fields are grouped and rendered in insertion order.

method.name: get_row_count
method.description: Returns the number of visible rows, including group headers when enabled.

method.name: get_row_rect
method.description: Provides the screen-space rectangle for a row, useful for custom overlays or hit testing.

method.name: set_group_gap
method.description: Sets the extra vertical spacing before new group headers (in pixels).

method.name: set_label_width
method.description: Manually assigns the width of the label column. Disable [member auto_label_width] to use it.

method.name: set_row_gap
method.description: Adjusts the spacing between consecutive rows (in pixels).

method.name: set_show_group_headers
method.description: Toggles rendering of group header labels above clustered fields.

method.name: set_wrap_values
method.description: Enables or disables multi-line wrapping for value text.

members.member: When enabled, the panel measures labels and picks a column width automatically.
Background color applied to group badges.
Text color used for badge labels.
Allows group sections to collapse/expand when their header is clicked.
Highlight color applied to the active/selected row.
Hover feedback color displayed when the pointer moves over a row.
Header text displayed above the detail panel content.
Aligns value text to the right edge of the column when [code]true[/code].

signal.name: row_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a row is clicked. Includes both the display label and the field's stable key.
